title: Kweek
author: Kweek
content: What is your current view on IEO investments for the next quarter? the points you take into consideration when investing in this type of release? What are its perks and benefits?

comments.author: Odusko
comments.body: Quote from: Kweek on July 28, 2022, 08:15:21 PMWhat is your current view on IEO investments for the next quarter? the points you take into consideration when investing in this type of release? What are its perks and benefits?IEO you mean initial exchange offering, this term is used in the alternative cryptocurrency market so I advise that you move this thread to the alternative cryptocurrency board. I believe the thread will receive the necessary attention that will trigger further discussion on this topic in the right section so do the needful to move the thread there, let keep the discussion on the topic, in my opinion IEO is no longer profitable not like 2018-2019 when IEO investment was the hype of the market.

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: Quote from: Kweek on July 28, 2022, 08:15:21 PMWhat is your current view on IEO investments for the next quarter? the points you take into consideration when investing in this type of release? What are its perks and benefits?If you're referring to know about initial exchange offering then that does not belong here, this is bitcoin discussion and I will advise to act as suggested above, another advise is just a reminder should in case you already know, most of these altcoins are illegitimate and a waste of time, effort and money, i advise you to stay tight with bitcoin if you're a newbie indeed and avoid risk

comments.author: bittick
comments.body: As long as IEO has been running by the major exchange sites and im sure there was no problem with it. The demand was so big. You must also aware if the fact that these days IEO was always doing so well even during the bearish market. Once IEO will be launched through binance and there would be a profit guarantee for you caused by binance was full with the whales who will be pumping the price of the new token. IEO will always become the best way to launch the new project. The demand guaranted by the exchange site and it will always be traded in a big profit after the trade already started.

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: I didn't know that it's still a thing, and many people are still buying into it. Is it something like the coin list thing that you will wait in line to get into the presell or something? I think the lockup is quite the sad part of participating in that. That's going to be the downfall of it, though; you might get out once it's too late or something. It's still the project devs that have profited from it from the people who bought in. I think it's a chance type still when it comes to profiting.

comments.author: Natalim
comments.body: Quote from: Kweek on July 28, 2022, 08:15:21 PMWhat is your current view on IEO investments for the next quarter? the points you take into consideration when investing in this type of release? What are its perks and benefits?I'd never thought it still exist after a major decrease in its number and the massive growth of metaverses and NFTs. Haven't died yet? Well, anyways- I don't think it remains valuable this time, or do people have the trust to invest in them after having so many scam issues in the past? next semester? Next quarter? All I gonna say is that only a few investors will take a look at them while the majority just ignore them.

comments.author: avikz
comments.body: Quote from: Kweek on July 28, 2022, 08:15:21 PMWhat is your current view on IEO investments for the next quarter? the points you take into consideration when investing in this type of release? What are its perks and benefits?IEOs are just an upgraded version of ICO. Since the credibility of ICOs has gone down to drain, the shady coin creators have found a way to sell off their shitcoins through an exchange. That's what is IEO. So personally I don't invest in IEOs. Because no exchange is doing a due diligence before accepting a coin into their platform for selling. So IEOs also don't have any credibility where I can put my hard earned money!

comments.author: bitkanu
comments.body: I think in the future IEO just gonna be the same as it is, the IEO trend is gone, the demand isn't overly inflated like it was in binance and the likes, I think it's gonna be normal IEO where it's just like at this current circumstance of correction.there are definitely some projects that could score some high return of investment just like right now, and the rest just gonna gets eliminated.

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: You must try to get more data about how good IEO is. IEO is known as a way for people to make instant money right now. So many people are in competition to get a spot. IEO was also pegged with the crypto trend. People wanna try to invest everything into the new project once the bullish market will come to the crypto market again.It doesn't even need wait for the next quarter and this time IEO can be considered as a good thing to invest. You must also try to take a look at so many successful ICO through icodrop

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: Kweek on July 28, 2022, 08:15:21 PMWhat is your current view on IEO investments for the next quarter? the points you take into consideration when investing in this type of release? What are its perks and benefits?IMO, from the various types of initial offers, IEO is the safest type of initial offer. Because this offer is an offer held on the Exchange. Of course this is an advantage for potential investors, they will feel safe because their funds / investments are protected by the exchange. Apart from security, investors will also benefit in terms of ROI, I don't see many projects fail after IEO on an exchange.Note: I'm talking about IEOs on major exchanges like Binance and FTX.

comments.author: Baofeng
comments.body: Is IEO still alive in 2022? Lol, I thought everyone is no longer or at least the majority is looking for other investment method this year.But as what others have said, maybe they are still alive, but I doubt that they will have the hype hype as around 2018-2019. We already have so many new investment thingy right now like NFT that many investors are no longer like wanted to be an angel investor on IEO. And I haven't heard of any top tier exchanges that their launchpad is still alive to support this projects.

comments.author: fzkto
comments.body: I think that by the end of the year the situation with IEO or other Launch Pad projects will be the same as it is now, i.e. risky. I haven't heard for a long time that every new project that is launched in this way has made a huge profit. This era is ending, just like when the ICO era ended.

comments.author: distr@yopmail.com
comments.body: Quote from: fzkto on July 30, 2022, 11:30:41 AMI think that by the end of the year the situation with IEO or other Launch Pad projects will be the same as it is now, i.e. risky. I haven't heard for a long time that every new project that is launched in this way has made a huge profit. This era is ending, just like when the ICO era ended.it looks like not much else brings big profits. but at this time we still see many new projects also doing IEO sales. some cooperate with launch platforms and then trade on exchanges like pancakes. even some projects are not promising after trading.as you said, the IEO will probably end up the same as the ICO. when more and more projects end up scammed.

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: My advice - if you can not identify a good project on your own, use one of the reputable exchanges we have in the space to participate in ieo.The reason - these exchanges know how to scout for the potential project with experience teams who are ready to be fully committed to the project they create long-term. The market is full of short to mid-term projects that are only based on hype with no real utility. And to be honest, it is not easy to fully identify a good project just by looking up the website and the team, there are other details that need to be checked which may not be accessible to an investor but can be accessible to exchanges. so imo, the best way to have a good ieo project is through exchanges.

comments.author: Doell
comments.body: Quote from: Kweek on July 28, 2022, 08:15:21 PMWhat is your current view on IEO investments for the next quarter ? the points you take into consideration when investing in this type of release? What are its perks and benefits?For the next quarter will launch your project at IEO? by looking at your previous post, I can assume to that direction. Well the point I consider for investing is clearly the product on their project, but I doubt even the majority of investors are not interested in this kind of investment anymore, so also I'll not take more risk for investment.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: Baofeng on July 30, 2022, 11:23:00 AMIs IEO still alive in 2022? Lol, I thought everyone is no longer or at least the majority is looking for other investment method this year.Sort of, there are still a few projects that are going through Binance launch pad. But unlike before, there's almost no interest in it. Those projects that come out on Binance these days, they're just like a bunch of incentives for their BNB holders on their vault.But the actual interest for investing into those projects, we're almost certain that they're not that really interested at all but they're just all for the value of it once it's sellable in the market.

comments.author: Kweek
comments.body: Quote from: Natalim on July 29, 2022, 11:25:27 AMQuote from: Kweek on July 28, 2022, 08:15:21 PMWhat is your current view on IEO investments for the next quarter? the points you take into consideration when investing in this type of release? What are its perks and benefits?I'd never thought it still exist after a major decrease in its number and the massive growth of metaverses and NFTs. Haven't died yet? Well, anyways- I don't think it remains valuable this time, or do people have the trust to invest in them after having so many scam issues in the past? next semester? Next quarter? All I gonna say is that only a few investors will take a look at them while the majority just ignore them. right, I understood. Thanks for your comment. But what other option would be? My perception about the IEO is that because it is a launch within a reliable exchange and with low cost depending on the token, sometimes it is worth the investmentright, I understood. Thanks for your comment. But what other option would be? My perception about the IEO is that because it is a launch within a reliable exchange and with low cost depending on the token, sometimes it is worth the investment

comments.author: Piesel
comments.body: Perhaps the current market conditions look confusing to a.great extent and that it makes the prediction harder one predict the future, but we all know how the previous IEO market wave ended and how hard it is for the altcoin market to succeed in the present market conditions. But then anything can still happen and we can still witness the unexpected positive outcome from the IEO market.

comments.author: crzy
comments.body: Quote from: Kweek on July 28, 2022, 08:15:21 PMWhat is your current view on IEO investments for the next quarter? the points you take into consideration when investing in this type of release? What are its perks and benefits?There’s a lesser demand in IEO projects and it’s hard to see good projects under this option maybe they will remain in the same position but if you are able to see promising project then you can give them a chance and invest some. Honestly, in a bear market like this I just invest on a good project that is already out in the market, they are more safe to buy at this time.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Quote from: Kweek on July 28, 2022, 08:15:21 PMWhat is your current view on IEO investments for the next quarter? the points you take into consideration when investing in this type of release? What are its perks and benefits?The basic look never changes: it's the team, the tokenomics, and the partnership of the project. These parameters will always matter in IEO, regardless of the market or trend. Even in a bearish trend, there can be projects that yield tens and hundreds of X's. Think of step ann or STEPN projects that gave 100 X's in a bear market. The trend of altcoins themselves is also important, if it is NFT or Metaverse, the project may collect a bit more capitalization than some DeFi protocol.
